GV06avpari_u:6: mūlam aṣṭāv aṣāḍhā eko 'bhijit tisraḥ śravaṇaḥ pañca śraviṣṭhā ekā śatabhiṣā catasraḥ proṣṭhapadau ekā revatī dve aśvayujau tisro bharaṇyaḥ

GV06avpari_u:241: (AVParis_1,26.7) svasti no astv abhayaṃ no astu namo 'horātrābhyām astu ||

GV06avpari_u:1259: (AVParis_18b,3.1) atha śravaṇe nakṣatre rājñām indramahasyeti vyākhyātaḥ
GV06avpari_u:1261: (AVParis_18b,5.1) athāpāmārgatrayodaśyāṃ śvete muhūrte snānaṃ kṛtvāpāmārgaṃ triḥ paribhrāmayed rājña upari mantreṇa ||
GV06avpari_u:1262: (AVParis_18b,5.2) iśānāṃ tvā bheṣajānām iti tribhiḥ sūktaiḥ pratīcīnaphala iti sūktena vā punaḥ snānam ||
GV06avpari_u:1263: (AVParis_18b,5.3) tata ārātrikaṃ paridhatteti dvābhyām iti samānam ||
GV06avpari_u:1265: (AVParis_18b,6.2) abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā ye 'syāṃ prācī dig iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1266: (AVParis_18b,6.3) mā no devā yas te sarpa ity etaiḥ sūktais tṛṇāni yugatardmanā saṃpātavanti gaṇaṃ ca prātitamitadhānāśane hastyaśvādiyugapat tantraṃ samānam || dhenur dakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:1267: (AVParis_18b,7.1) athākṣayyanavamyāṃ rātrau hastyaśvādīnām anīkānāṃ rathasya parahomaś ca
GV06avpari_u:1268: (AVParis_18b,8.1) atha viṣṇudvādaśyāṃ purohitaḥ paścimāṃ saṃdhyām upāsya
GV06avpari_u:1269: gṛhītadarbho yatra rājānam abhigamya pauṣṭikahomaś ca rātrau nīrājanaṃ kṛtvā hastyaśvebhyaś ca ||
GV06avpari_u:1270: (AVParis_18b,9.1) atha kārttikyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ raivatyām aśvayujyāṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1271: (AVParis_18b,10.1) athāgrayaṇīpaurṇamāsyāṃ tantraṃ kṛtvāpād agreti dvābhyāṃ rasaṃ saṃpātyābhimantrya rājānaṃ prāśayet || dhenur dakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:1275: (AVParis_18b,13.1) atha grīṣmapratipady āyuṣyam iti snānaṃ kṛtvāpāṃ
GV06avpari_u:1276: sūktair āplutya prakṣiṇam āvrtyāpa upaspṛśyety uktam ||
GV06avpari_u:1277: (AVParis_18b,14.1) atha caitryāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ tejovrataṃ trirātram aśnātīty uktam ||
GV06avpari_u:1278: (AVParis_18b,15.1) atha madanatrayodaśyāṃ vaiśākhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ca madhyāhne garte vā vāpyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ ghate vā sarvagandhān prakṣipya
GV06avpari_u:1279: prāktantram abhyātānāntaṃ kṛtvā siṃhe vyāghre yaśo haviḥ prātar agniṃ girāv aragarāṭeṣu divas pṛthivyā ity etaiḥ sūktair udakaṃ saṃpātyābhimantrya rājānaṃ snāpayet || praviśya saṃprokṣyeti ca tantraṃ saṃsthāpayet || dhenur dakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:1280: (AVParis_18b,16.1) atha śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vijaye muhūrte rakṣantu
GV06avpari_u:1281: tvāgnaya iti catasṛbhī rakṣābandhanaṃ kṛtvā nīrājanaṃ ca bāhyenopaniṣkramyeti paiṭhīnasiḥ
GV06avpari_u:1284: (AVParis_18b,19.1) atha rājakarmāṇi pratinakṣatraṃ kartavyānīty āyudhāni khaḍgaprabhṛtīni bibhṛyād iti kṛttikārohiṇyādīni vyākhyātāni ||
GV06avpari_u:1293: (AVParis_18c,1.2) kārttikeyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ raivatyām āśvayujyāṃ vā gavāṃ
GV06avpari_u:1294: goṣṭhe paurṇamāsatantram ājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā rudraraudrābhyām ājyaṃ juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1295: (AVParis_18c,1.3) pūṣā gā anu etu na iti catasṛbhiḥ pauṣṇasya juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1296: (AVParis_18c,1.4) pūṣā gā anu etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣātu sarvataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1298: (AVParis_18c,1.5) pūṣann anu pra gā ihi(iti) yajamānasya sunvataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1300: (AVParis_18c,1.6) pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ pari pūṣā purastād iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1301: (AVParis_18c,1.7) indrasya kukṣiḥ sāhasras tveṣa iti ṛṣabhaṃ saṃpātavantaṃ kṛtvā ya indra iva deveṣu iti ṛṣabhasya dakṣiṇe karṇe japet ||
GV06avpari_u:1303: (AVParis_18c,1.9) ayaṃ prajānāṃ janitā prajāpatir gavāṃ goṣṭha iha madhyato vasaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1304: vatsatarīṣu apasadane gavām adhi tiṣṭha paśūn bhavanasya gopāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1306: (AVParis_18c,1.11) retodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi vayodhāyai tvātisṛjāmi yūthatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi gaṇatvāyai tvātisṛjāmi sahasrapoṣāyai
GV06avpari_u:1307: tva7atisṛjāmi aparimitapoṣāyai tvātisṛjāmīti paryukṣyaikarūpaṃ dvirūpaṃ bahurūpaṃ vā yo vā yūthaṃ chādayati yūthena tejasvinālaṃkṛtenālaṃkṛtam
GV06avpari_u:1308: aparājitāṃ diśaṃ niṣkrāmayeyuḥ saha vatsatarībhis tantraṃ saṃsthāpayeyur
GV06avpari_u:1309: (AVParis_18c,1.12) atha brahmaṇe gāṃ payasvinīṃ dadyāt pāyasena brāhmaṇān bhojayitvotsṛjya sarvān kāmān āpnoti akṣayāṇ ca lokān āpnotīti
GV06avpari_u:1313: (AVParis_19,1.3) saṃbhṛteṣu saṃbhāreṣu brahmā rājā ca ubhau snātau ahatavasanau surabhisujātānulepanau karmaṇyau vratavantau upavasataḥ
GV06avpari_u:1314: (AVParis_19,1.4) [vratavantau] śvo bhūte śamnodevyāḥ pādair ardharcābhyām ṛcā ṣakṛtvodakaṃ pari vācam ācānto (AVParis_19,1.5) barhir upakalpayitvā rājānam anvālabhya juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1315: (AVParis_19,1.6) arvāñcam indraṃ trātāram indram indraḥ sutrāmā imam indra vardhaya kṣatriyaṃ me hantāya vṛṣa indrasya indro jayāti iti ca hutvā rāṣṭrasaṃvargaiś cā (AVParis_19,1.7) atha indram utthāpayanti ā tvā ahārṣam antar dhruvādyaur viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu iti sarvato 'pramattā dhārayerann
GV06avpari_u:1316: (AVParis_19,1.8) adbhutaṃ hi savanānayet samutthitaṃ bhavati || yadi prācyām agnibhayam || yadi dakṣiṇasyāṃ yamabhayam || yadi pratīcyāṃ varuṇabhayam || yadi udīcyāṃ kṣudbhayam || yadi antardeśebhyobhayato vidyād
GV06avpari_u:1317: (AVParis_19,1.9) agnir mā pātu agniṃ te vasumantam ṛcchantv iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1319: (AVParis_19,1.10) gṛdhraś ced asmin nipatati mṛtyor bhayaṃ bhavati || yad vā kṛṣṇaśakunir antarikṣrṇa patati iti japed yas tvā gṛdhraḥ kapota iti
GV06avpari_u:1320: antato japet (AVParis_19,1.11) sarvatra anājñāteṣu trirātraṃ ghṛtakambalam ||
GV06avpari_u:1321: (AVParis_19,1.12) śirobhaṅge tu rājānaṃ madhyabhaṅge tu mantriṇam |
GV06avpari_u:1325: (AVParis_19,2.1) sāvitryā abhimantritaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam āvartayed rājānam abhibhūr yajña iti etais tribhiḥ sūktair anvārabdhe rājani
GV06avpari_u:1328: (AVParis_19,3.2) indradevatāḥ syur ye rājño bhṛtyāḥ syuḥ sarve dīkṣitā brahmacāriṇaḥ syur (AVParis_19,3.3) indraṃ copasadya yajeran || trirātraṃ saptarātraṃ vā
GV06avpari_u:1329: (AVParis_19,3.4) trir ayanam ahnām upatiṣṭhante havisā ca yajante ||
GV06avpari_u:1330: (AVParis_19,3.5) āvṛta indram aham iti indra kṣatram iti haviṣo hutvā
GV06avpari_u:1331: (AVParis_19,3.6) brāhmaṇān svastivācya indram avabhṛthāya vrajanti (AVParis_19,3.7) apāṃ sūktair āplutya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya apa upaspṛśya anapekṣamāṇāḥ pratyetya brāhmaṇān bhaktyā yad īpsitaṃ varapradānaiḥ paritoṣayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1333: (AVParis_19,3.9) śvaḥśvo 'sya rāṣṭraṃ jyāyo bhavati eko 'syāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājā bhavati na purā jarasaḥ pramīyate ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃvidvān
GV06avpari_u:1338: (AVParis_19b,1.2) paripṛṣṭaḥ sa tena atha atharvā yajatāṃ varaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1341: brahmayāgaṃ prayatnena śṛṇu etaṃ tad yathākramam ||
GV06avpari_u:1345: patākātoraṇir yuktaṃ dvāraiś ca api pṛthagvidhaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1347: gomayena pralipya ādau pūjayed varṇakiḥ pṛthak ||
GV06avpari_u:1348: (AVParis_19b,2.2) puṣpaiś ca vividhaiḥ śubhraiḥ phalaiś ca api arcayed budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1349: tato baliṃ hared rātrau caturdikṣu vidhānavit ||
GV06avpari_u:1350: (AVParis_19b,2.3) pradīpān ghṛtapūrṇāṃś ca pradadyād vividhān tathā |
GV06avpari_u:1351: ttato maṇḍapamadhye tu vartayed divyamaṇḍalam || [caturaśraṃ caturdvāraṃ vṛttākāram atha api vā] ||
GV06avpari_u:1353: bahiś ca varṇaiḥ śubhrair nānā śobhāṃ prakalpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1354: (AVParis_19b,2.5) madhye padmaṃ tu saṃsthāpya brahmāṇaṃ parameśvaram |
GV06avpari_u:1356: (AVParis_19b,3.1) tatha imā āpa ityā dyair yathāvad adhivāsayet |
GV06avpari_u:1357: rocanācandanādyaiś ca puṣpair dhūpaiś ca pūjayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1358: (AVParis_19b,3.2) ghṛtapradīpamālyaiś ca vastrair bhakṣaiś ca śobhanaiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1359: sitacandanakarpūraṃ dadyād vā api hi guggulam ||
GV06avpari_u:1360: (AVParis_19b,3.3) pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā namet sarvāṅgakair naraḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1361: dakṣiṇe paścime vā api bhāge vediḥ praśasyate ||
GV06avpari_u:1366: nīlarudraiś caruṃ vidvān vidhinā śrapayed budhaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1368: japen mantrān tathāyuṣyān maṅgalyāṃś cāpi yatnataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1369: (AVParis_19b,4.2) hutvā ca cātanaṃ tatra mātṛnāmagaṇena ca |
GV06avpari_u:1375: (AVParis_19b,4.5) tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1379: (AVParis_19b,5.2) kuryād uttaratantraṃ ca sadasyān vācayet tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1383: (AVParis_19b,5.4) dattvā ca dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā dadyād gaṇabaliṃ niśi |
GV06avpari_u:1384: gṛhadevās tu saṃpūjyāḥ kāryaś cāpy utsavo gṛhe ||
GV06avpari_u:1386: achedyās taravaḥ kāryāḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca varjayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1387: (AVParis_19b,5.6) bandhanasthāś ca moktavyā baddhāḥ krodhāc ca śatravaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1388: abhayaṃ ghoṣayed deśe guruṃ ca paripūjayet ||
GV06avpari_u:1389: (AVParis_19b,5.7) abhayaṃ sarvato dattvā iṣṭe ca parameśvare |
GV06avpari_u:1390: dīrgham āyur avāpnoti kṛtsnāṃ bhuṅkte vasuṃdharām ||
GV06avpari_u:1393: (AVParis_19b,5.9) kṛtābhiṣekaḥ kṛtayāga eṣa kṛtāhhnikaḥ kṛtarakṣaḥ sureśaḥ
GV06avpari_u:1394: | atharvaṇo 'nugraham āśu labdhvā triviṣṭapaṃ virarājāsapatnam || iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1399: (AVParis_20,1.3) śvo bhūte ṣaṣṭhyām upavāsaṃ kṛtvā prāgudīcīṃ diśaṃ niṣkramya śucau deśe manohare noṣare maṇḍalaṃ trayodaśaratniṃ kṛtvā madhye maṇḍapasya sarvavānaspatyāṃ mālāṃ kṛtvā ghaṇṭāpatākāsrajaḥ pratisaraṃ ca mālāpṛṣṭhe kṛtvā madhye darpaṇāṃś copakalpayitvā tatra yaṃ vahanti hayāḥ
GV06avpari_u:1401: (AVParis_20,2.1) yaṃ vahanti hayāḥ śvetā nityayuktā manojavāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1402: tam ahaṃ śvetasaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1403: (AVParis_20,2.2) yaṃ vahanti gajāḥ siṃhā vyāghrāś cāpi viṣāṇinaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1404: tam ahaṃ siṃhasaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1405: (AVParis_20,2.3) yaṃ vahanti mayūrāś ca citrapakṣā vihaṃgamāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1406: tam ahaṃ citrasaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1408: tam ahaṃ sarvasaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1410: tam ahaṃ śaktisaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1411: (AVParis_20,2.6) yaś ca mātṛgaṇair nityaṃ sadā parivṛto yuvā |
GV06avpari_u:1412: tam ahaṃ mātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1413: (AVParis_20,2.7) yaś ca kanyāsahasreṇa sadā parivṛto mahān |
GV06avpari_u:1414: tam ahaṃ siṃhasaṃnāhaṃ dhūrtam āvāhayāmy aham ||
GV06avpari_u:1415: (AVParis_20,2.8) āyātu devaḥ sagaṇaḥ sasainyaḥ savāhanaḥ sānucaraḥ
GV06avpari_u:1418: (AVParis_20,2.9) āyātu devo mama kārttikeyo brahmaṇyapitraiḥ saha mātṛbhiś ca |
GV06avpari_u:1419: bhrātrā viśākhena ca viśvarūpa imaṃ baliṃ sānucara juṣasva ||
GV06avpari_u:1421: (AVParis_20,3.1) saṃviśasva varaghaṇṭāpsaraḥstave yatra subhujo hi nirmitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:1422: saṃviṣṭo me dhehi dīrgham āyuḥ prajāṃ paśūṃś caiva vināyakasena
GV06avpari_u:1423: (AVParis_20,3.2) imā āpa iti gandhodakaṃ pādyaṃ dadyāt || pratigṛhṇātu bhagavān devo dhūrta iti || ṣat caiva hiraṇyavarṇā itīme divyo gandharva
GV06avpari_u:1424: iti gandhān yas te gandha iti cemāḥ sumanasa iti sumanasaḥ || priyaṃ dhātur iti... ||
GV06avpari_u:1425: (AVParis_20,3.3) vanaspatir aso medhya iti dhūpam || yakṣyeṇa te divā
GV06avpari_u:1426: agniḥ śukraś ceti dīpam || yo viśvataḥ supratīka iti parṇāni ||
GV06avpari_u:1427: (AVParis_20,3.4) prakṣālya haviṣy upasādayed dadhyodanaṃ kṣīrodanaṃ guḍodanaṃ mudgapayasamiśradhānyamodakāni sarvagandhān sarvarsān udakapūrṇaṃ mūlapurṇaṃ puṣpapūrṇaṃ phalapūrṇaṃ rasapūrṇaṃ copakalpayitvā
GV06avpari_u:1428: (AVParis_20,3.5) indraḥ sītam ity ullikhya agne prety agniṃ praṇīya prajvalya prāñcam idhmam upasamādhāya bhaga etam idhmam iti tisṛbhir etam idhmaṃ sugārhaspatya ity upasamādhāya samiddho agnir iti samiddham
GV06avpari_u:1430: (AVParis_20,4.1) bhadram icchanto hiraṇyagarbho mamāgne varcas tvayā manyo yas te manyo yad devā devaheḍanam iti ṣat kāmasūktādayo daśa mahīpataye
GV06avpari_u:1432: (AVParis_20,4.2) dhūrtāya skandāya viśākhāya pinākasenāya bhrātṛstrīkāmāya svacchandāya varaghaṇtāya nirmilāya lohitagātrāya śalakaṭaṅkaṭāya svāheti
GV06avpari_u:1433: hutvā agnaye prajāpataye ye devā divy ekādaśa stheti anumataye agnaye sviṣṭakṛta iti ca ||
GV06avpari_u:1435: sa me stuto viśvarūpaj sarvān arthān prayacchatu ||
GV06avpari_u:1438: (AVParis_20,5.3) ye bhaktyā bhajante dhūrtaṃ brahmaṇyaṃ ca yaśasvinam |
GV06avpari_u:1439: sarve te dhanavantaḥ syuḥ prajāvanto yaśasvinaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1440: (AVParis_20,5.4) yathendras tu varān labdhvā prītas tu bhagavān purā |
GV06avpari_u:1441: dehi me vipulān bhogān bhaktānāṃ ca viśeṣata iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1443: (AVParis_20,5.6) upahāram imaṃ deva mayā bhaktyā niveditam |
GV06avpari_u:1446: bhavebhave nādibhave bhajasva māṃ bhavodbhaveti bhavāya namaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1447: (AVParis_20,6.2) devaṃ prapadye varadaṃ prapadye skandaṃ prapadye ca kumāram ugram |
GV06avpari_u:1448: ṣaṇṇāṃ sutaṃ kṛttikānāṃ ṣaḍāsyam agneḥ putraṃ sādhanaṃ gopathoktaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1449: (AVParis_20,6.3) raktāni yasya puṣpāṇi raktaṃ yasya vilepanam |
GV06avpari_u:1450: kukkuṭā yasya raktākṣāḥ sa me skandaḥ prasīdatu ||
GV06avpari_u:1451: (AVParis_20,6.4) āgneyaṃ kṛttikāputram aindraṃ ke cid adhīyate |
GV06avpari_u:1452: ke cit pāśupataṃ raudraṃ yo 'si so 'si namo 'stu ta iti ||
GV06avpari_u:1454: (AVParis_20,6.6) bhagavān kva cid apratirūpaḥ svāhā bhagavān kva cid apratirūpaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1456: (AVParis_20,6.8) ete [te] deva gandhā etāni puṣpāṇy eṣa dhūpa etāṃ mālāṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇāṃ kṛtvā ādityakartitaṃ sūtram iti pratisaram ābadhnīyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:1458: aśvibhyāṃ grathito granthir brahmaṇā pratisaraḥ kṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:1459: (AVParis_20,7.2) dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam aśubhasya ca ghātanam |
GV06avpari_u:1461: (AVParis_20,7.3) rakṣobhyaś ca piśācebhyo gandharvebhyas tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:1462: manuṣyebhyo bhayaṃ nāsti yac ca syād duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:1464: sarvasmāt pātakān mukto bhaved vīras tathaiva ca ||

GV06avpari_u:2110: koṭihomaṃ viduḥ prājñā lakṣaṃ vāyutam eva vā ||
GV06avpari_u:2111: (AVParis_30b,2.10) avijñātaṃ ca yat pāpaṃ sahasā caiva yat kṛtam |
GV06avpari_u:2112: tat sarvaṃ lakṣahomasya karaṇād dhi vinaśyati ||

GV06avpari_u:2123: aiśvaryam āyur ārogyaṃ putrā vijaya eva ca ||

GV06avpari_u:2126: (AVParis_31,2.1) tayā homaś ca kartavyaḥ satataṃ siddhim icchatā |

GV06avpari_u:2130: (AVParis_31,2.3) yādṛśaṃ kṛtavān pūrvam atharvā tryambakasya tu |
GV06avpari_u:2133: kuruṣva mama tat karma mahattvaṃ yena labhyate ||
GV06avpari_u:2134: (AVParis_31,2.5) aiśvaryam āyur ārogyaṃ sthānaṃ ca paramaṃ prabho |
GV06avpari_u:2135: putrā lakṣmīr yaśo medhā balaṃ pauruṣyam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2137: gāyatrīṃ tapasā yuktām ṛcaḥ padam itīti ha ||
GV06avpari_u:2138: (AVParis_31,3.2) [ṛcaḥ padaṃ mātrayeti mantre vijñāyate hi sā |] gāyatrī vai tripād brahma viśvarūpā ca saṃsthitā ||
GV06avpari_u:2142: tato mahattvam agamad aiśaryaṃ paramaṃ tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:2143: (AVParis_31,3.5) mahādeva iti cāsya nāma lokeṣu viśrutam |
GV06avpari_u:2144: upadravāś ca ye ke cid upaghātās tathaiva ca |
GV06avpari_u:2145: sarve 'sya praśamaṃ yātāḥ skandaṃ putraṃ ca labdhavān ||
GV06avpari_u:2146: (AVParis_31,4.1) tataḥ prītas tu bhagavāñ śaṃkaraḥ paryapṛcchata |
GV06avpari_u:2149: sāvitraṃ tena homo 'yaṃ kṛto me koṭisaṃmitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2151: yatprayogād bhavec chāntir vṛddhiś ca paramā nṛṇām ||
GV06avpari_u:2156: (AVParis_31,5.1) ārambhaṃ tasya kurvīta śukle cāpi tithau śubhe |
GV06avpari_u:2158: (AVParis_31,5.2) rohiṇyāṃ vaiṣṇave tvāṣṭre pauṣṇe maitrottareṣu ca |
GV06avpari_u:2160: (AVParis_31,5.3) atha cet tvarate kartuṃ koṭihomaṃ mahāphalam |
GV06avpari_u:2167: tāvat kuryād budhaḥ sarvaṃ yāvan no nairṛtaṃ kṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:2169: nirmathya hāvayet tatra samidho brāhmaṇān bahūn ||
GV06avpari_u:2170: (AVParis_31,6.2) śataṃ sahasraṃ koṭiṃ vā viṃśatir daśa vā dvijāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2172: (AVParis_31,6.3) svayaṃ vāpi yajed brahmā savitāraṃ dinedine |
GV06avpari_u:2175: samidbhiḥ sarvakāmas tu bilvaiḥ prāpnoti kāñcanam ||
GV06avpari_u:2176: (AVParis_31,6.5) labhate śriyam agryāṃ tu padmais tejo ghṛtena tu |
GV06avpari_u:2177: dadhnā tu labhate putrān payasā brahmavarcasam ||
GV06avpari_u:2183: (AVParis_31,7.3) pratyekaṃ caiva hotṝṇāṃ dātavyā dakṣiṇā tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2184: niṣko aśvo gaur vāsaś ca hiraṇyaṃ vāpi śaktitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2185: (AVParis_31,7.4) yaś caivāpi bhaved brahmā prayoktā sarvakarmaṇām |
GV06avpari_u:2186: sarvasvaṃ tasya deyaṃ syād dhiraṇyaṃ vāpi tatsamam ||
GV06avpari_u:2187: (AVParis_31,7.5) koṭihome samāpte tu yajed grahagaṇān budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2188: kārayed amṛtāṃ caiva ghṛtakambalam eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2190: paracakrāgame tv aindrī ghṛtakambala[m] eva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2196: (AVParis_31,8.4) āmnātaṃ tatra yat karma tad ante kārayed budhaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2197: eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭo abhicāre vidhīyate ||
GV06avpari_u:2199: ārambhaṃ tasya ghoreṣu nakṣatreṣu dineṣu ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2201: maghāśleṣā tathā mūlaṃ revaty ārdrā ca sarvadā ||
GV06avpari_u:2202: (AVParis_31,9.1) darbhārthe tu śarān kuryād ghṛtārthe tailam ucyate |
GV06avpari_u:2203: svāhākāre tu phaṭkāro veṇyādyāḥ syuś caturdaśa ||
GV06avpari_u:2204: (AVParis_31,9.2) cāṇḍālāgnau citāgnau vā sūtikāgnāv athāpi vā |
GV06avpari_u:2209: tāpayet pratilomāṃ tu sāvitrīṃ manasā japet ||
GV06avpari_u:2210: (AVParis_31,9.5) kaṇṭhe śūlārpitāṃ kṛtvā tāpayet tu dinedine |
GV06avpari_u:2211: yāvac chatrur vaśaṃ yāti vilīnāyāṃ vinaśyati ||
GV06avpari_u:2213: prītimān ucyate yena tac chubhaṃ bhautikaṃ dadau ||
GV06avpari_u:2214: (AVParis_31,10.2) atharvā bhautikaṃ labdhvā śiṣyebhyas tat punar dadau |
GV06avpari_u:2215: śubhaṃ mokṣakaraṃ puṇyaṃ priyaṃ paśupater vratam ||
GV06avpari_u:2216: (AVParis_31,10.3) etaj jñātvā tu yaḥ samyak koṭihomaṃ prayojayet |
GV06avpari_u:2217: sarvān kāmān avāpnoti brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:2218: (AVParis_31,10.4) yas tv imaṃ śrāvayed vidvān paṭhate caiva sarvadā |
GV06avpari_u:2221: hitārtham uddhṛto granthaḥ koṭihomas tu viśrutaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2223: (AVParis_32,1) oṃ bhūs tat savituḥ śaṃ no devīḥ śāntā dyauḥ śaṃ na indrāgnī śaṃ no vāto vātu uṣā apa svasus tama iti śāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2224: (AVParis_32,2) kṛtyāpratiharaṇo dūṣyā dūṣir asi īśānāṃ tvā samaṃ jyotir uto asy abandhukṛd ye purastāt suparṇas tvā yāṃ te cakruḥ pratīcīnaphalo yad duṣkṛtam ayaṃ pratisaro yāṃ kalpayantīti kṛtyāpratiharaṇāni || iti kṛtyāgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2225: (AVParis_32,3) cātanaḥ stuvānam idaṃ havir ye 'māvāsyām upa prāgān niḥsālām arāyakṣayaṇaṃ śaṃ no devī pṛśniparṇy ā paśyati tānt satyaujās tvayā pūrvaṃ purastād yukto antardāve juhuta prāgnaye rakṣohaṇam ity anuvākaś cātanāni || iti cātanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2226: (AVParis_32,4) mātṛnāmā divyo gandharva ā paśyatīmaṃ me agne yau te māteti mātṛnāmāni || iti mātṛgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2227: (AVParis_32,5) vāstoṣpatīya āśānām āśāpālebhya ihaiva dhruvām ṛdhaṅmantro
GV06avpari_u:2228: yonim uta putraḥ pitaram indrasya gṛho 'sīti catasro dive svāhāśamavarma
GV06avpari_u:2229: me pṛthivyai śrotrāyeti dhanvānīti dve ūrjaṃ bibhrad iti ṣaṭsatyaṃ bṛhad ity anuvāko vāstoṣpatīyāni || iti vāstugaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2230: (AVParis_32,6) pāpmahā vi devā jarasāvṛtam apa naḥ śośucad agham ava mā pāpmann iti pāpmahā || iti pāpmahā gaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2231: (AVParis_32,7) takmanāśano jarāyujaḥ prathamo yad agnir ud agātāṃ daśavṛkṣa muñca kṣetriyāt tvā hariṇasya raghuṣyado muñcāmi tvā bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ yo giriṣu dive svāhāgnis takmānam agner ivāsyāva mā pāpmant
GV06avpari_u:2232: sṛjāva jyām iva varaṇo vārayātā imaṃ yavaṃ vidradhasya balāsasya namo rūrāyeti dve śīrṣaktiṃ śīrṣāmayam iti takmanāśanāni || iti takmanāśanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2233: (AVParis_32,8) duḥsvapnanāśanāni dauṣvapnyaṃ daurjīvityaṃ paro 'paihi yo na jīvo 'si pary āvarte duṣvapnyād yat svapne annam aśnami yo na stāyad dipsati yo naḥ suptāṃ jāgrato yan me manso duṣvapnyaṃ kāma svapnaṃ suptvā vidma te svapneti trayaḥ paryāyā duḥsvapnanāśanāni || iti duḥsvapnanāśanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2234: (AVParis_32,9) āyuṣyo yathā dyauḥ prāṇāpānāv ojo 'si tubhyam evākṣībhyāṃ te muñcāmi tvota devā āvatas ta upa priyam antakāya mṛtyava ā rabhasva
GV06avpari_u:2235: prāṇāya namo viṣāsahim ity āyuṣyāṇi || iti āyuṣyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2236: (AVParis_32,10) varcasyo ye triṣaptā asmin vasu prātar agniṃ hastivarcasaṃ siṃhe vyāghre yaśo havir yaśasaṃ mendro girāv aragarāṭeṣu yathā somaḥ prātaḥsavane yac ca varco akṣeṣu yena mahānaghnyā jaghanam iti varcasyāni || iti varcasyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2237: (AVParis_32,11) svastyayano amūḥ pāre pātaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā tvaṣṭā me daivyaṃ yena soma namo devavadhebhyo 'bhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv upa prāgāt
GV06avpari_u:2238: sahasrākṣo 'namitraṃ no adharād yamomṛtyur bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu tyam ū
GV06avpari_u:2239: ṣu trātāram indraḥ sutrāmā sa sutrāmā ā mandrair indra marmāṇi te varma me dyāvāpṛthivī aindrāgnaṃ varma girayas te yat te madhyaṃ yās te prācīr mā naḥ paścād iti svastyayanāni || iti svastyayanagaṇaḥ (AVParis_32,12) abhayaḥ svastidā viśāṃ brāhmaṇena paryuktāsi na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo abhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv abhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī asmai grāmāya hataṃ tardaṃ pūṣemā āśā indraḥ sutrāmā maitaṃ panthāṃ svastidā viśāṃ patir nama te ghoṣiṇībhya ā te rāṣṭram idam uc chreyo yata indra bhayāmaha ity
GV06avpari_u:2241: (AVParis_32,13) aparājito vidmā śarasya mā no cidann adārasṛt svastidā saṃśitaṃ me tvayā manyo yas te manyo etā devasenā avamanyur nirhastaḥ pari
GV06avpari_u:2242: vartmāny abhibhūr indro jāyaty abhi tvendrety aparājitāni || ity aparājitagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2243: (AVParis_32,14) śarmavarmā yaḥ sapatna itaś ca yad amutaś cāpendra dviṣato
GV06avpari_u:2244: yūyaṃ naḥ pravata imam agna āyuṣe tisro devīr uruvyacā no indrasya śarmāsīti uttamāṃ varjayitvā yena devā asurāṇām anaḍudbhyas tvam iti dve tanūṣ ṭe vājin vājasya nu prasave devānāṃ patnīr adhi brūhi rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinaṃ ye srāktyaṃ varma me dyāvāpṛṭhivī aindrāgnaṃ varma bahulaṃ varma mahyam ayaṃ mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmad aspatnaṃ purastād iti śarmavarmā ||
GV06avpari_u:2246: (AVParis_32,15) devapurā ye purastād brahma jajñānaṃ sahasradhāra evāgnir mā pātu agniṃ te vasuvantaṃ mitraḥ pṛthivyod akrāmad apa ny adhuḥ
GV06avpari_u:2247: pauruṣeyaṃ vadhaṃ jitam asmākam iti devapurīyaḥ || iti devapurīyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2248: (AVParis_32,16) rudro ye 'syāṃ prācī dig itirudragaṇaḥ || iti rudragaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2249: (AVParis_32,17) raudro rudra jalāṣabheṣaja ye 'syāṃ prācī dig ud itas trayo akraman bhavāśarvau manve vāṃ brahma jajñānam anāptā ye sahasradhāra eva grīṣmo hemanto anaḍudbhyas tvaṃ mahyam āpo vaiśvānaro yamo mṛtyur yāṃ te rudra yo agnau rudro bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ bhavāśarvāv idaṃ brūmo yas te
GV06avpari_u:2250: sarpo vṛścikas tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād iti raudragaṇaḥ || iti raudragaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2251: (AVParis_32,18) citrāgaṇo mā no vidann adārasṛt svastidā viśām amūhoāre aghadviṣṭā agne yat te tapa iti pañca sūktāni rudra jalāṣabheṣaja ye 'syāṃ
GV06avpari_u:2252: prācī dig vi devā uta devā agner manva itiprabhṛtīni mṛgārasūktāny uttamaṃ varjayitvāpa naḥ śośucad aghaṃ pṛthivyām agnaye mamāgne vrahma jajñānam anāptā ye sahasradhāre savitā prasavānāṃ nava prāṇān pātaṃ nas tvaṣṭā me yena soma namo devavadhebhyo 'bhayaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv upa prāgāt sahasrākṣaḥ siṃhe vyāghre 'bhayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī grīṣmo hemanto 'naḍudbhyas tvaṃ mahyam āpo vaiśvānaro yamo mṛtyur abhi tvendra viśvajit trāyamāṇāyai imaṃ me agne viṣāṇā pāśān śakadhūmaṃ somārudreti dve bṛhaspatir nas tyam ū ṣu trātāram indraḥ sutrāmā ā mandrair indra marmāṇi te antakāya mṛtyavā ā rabhasvāyaṃ pratisaro 'yaṃ me varaṇo bhavāśarvau mṛḍataṃ prāṇāya namo 'gniṃ brūma ity arthasūktaṃ satyaṃ bṛhad iti dve prathame girayas te yat te madhyaṃ yās te prācīr mā naḥ paścād grīṣmas te bhūme varṣāṇy upasthās te bhūme mātaḥ sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho jātavedā mā pra gāma patho yo yajñasya tasmai prācyā
GV06avpari_u:2253: diśo antardeśād iti paryāyaś citrāgaṇaḥ || iti citrāgaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2254: (AVParis_32,19) patnīvanto aditir dyauḥ sinīvāli kuhūṃ devīm iti trīṇi sūktāni patnīvantaḥ || iti patnīvantagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2255: (AVParis_32,19b) svasti mātra indra juṣasvāyā viṣṭhā śive te stāṃ pādābhyāṃ te saṃ te śirṣṇo vatso virāja ity ekā uccā patantam iti dve bhūyān indro viṣāsahiṃ sahamānam ity ādityagaṇaḥ (AVParis_32,20) śaṃ no devī śaṃ na indrāgnī śaṃ no vāto vātu śāntā dyauḥ
GV06avpari_u:2257: (AVParis_32,21) gane yad iti pañca sūktāni pañcāpatyāni bhavanti pāñcajanyāni bhavanti pāñcāpatyo gaṇaḥ || iti pañcāpatyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2258: (AVParis_32,22) ambayo yanti śambhumayobhubhyāṃ brahma jajñānam asya
GV06avpari_u:2259: vāmasya yo rohita ud asya krtavo mūrdhāham iti dve sūkte viṣāsahim iti salilagaṇaḥ || iti salilagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2261: (AVParis_32,24) aghadviṣṭā devajātā śaṃ no devī varaṇo vārayā[tai] pippalī vidradhasya yā babhrava iti gaṇakarmā gaṇo bhaisajyaś ca bhavati || iti bhaiṣajyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2262: (AVParis_32,25) ayaṃ te yonir ā no bhara dhītī vā ya ity arthasūktam utthāpano gaṇaḥ || ity utthāpanagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2263: (AVParis_32,26) ambayo yanti śambhumayobhū hiraṇyavarṇā niḥsālāṃ ye agnayo brahma jajñānam ity ekaita devā mṛgārasūktāny uttamaṃ varjayitvāpa naḥ śośucad aghaṃ punantu mā sasruṣīr himavataḥ pra sravanti vāyog pūtaḥ pavitreṇa śaṃ ca no mayaś ca no 'naḍudbhyas tvaṃ mahyam āpo vaiśvānaro raśmibhir yamo mṛtyur viśvajit saṃjñānaṃ no yady antarikṣe punar maitv indriyaṃ śivā naḥ śaṃ no vāto vātu agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti śāntigaṇaḥ
GV06avpari_u:2265: (AVParis_32,27) ambayo yanti śambhumayobhū hiraṇyavarṇā uta devā yady antarikṣe punar naitv indriyaṃ śivā naḥ śaṃ no vāto vātv agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti śāntātīyo laghuśāntigaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2266: (AVParis_32,28) ye triṣaptā mamāgne varcaḥ prātar agniṃ girāv aragarāṭeṣu divas pṛthivyā hastivarcasaṃ siṃhe vyāghre yaśo havir yas te gandha iti tisṛbhir varcasyagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2267: (AVParis_32,29) yā asurā manuṣyā mā no vidan namo devavadhebhya ity
GV06avpari_u:2270: (AVParis_32,31) [ya] āśānām āśāpālebhyo agner manva iti sapta sūktāni yā oṣadhayaḥ somarājñīr vaiśvānaro na ā gamac chumbhanī dyāvāpṛthivī yad
GV06avpari_u:2271: arvācī[na]m agniṃ brūmo vanaspatīn iti muñcantu nā bhavāśārvā yā devīr yan mātalī rathakrītam ity etāś catasro varjayitvā aṃholiṅgagaṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2276: (AVParis_33,1.13) athendro ha vā asuraiḥ parājitaś cintām āpede
GV06avpari_u:2277: (AVParis_33,1.4) taṃ savitābravīt prāyaścittaṃ kuruṣvāpratiruddho bhaviṣyasīti (AVParis_33,1.5) tam indro 'bravīt || bhagavan tvam evāpratiruddhaḥ

GV06avpari_u:2645: (AVParis_37,4.2) vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa yan me chidraṃ punar maitv indriyaṃ
GV06avpari_u:2646: mā na āpo medhāṃ mā no medhāṃ mā naḥ piparid aśvineti saṃnatibhir ājyaṃ juhuyād vyāhṛtibhiś ca gāṃ ca kartre dadyāt sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2647: (AVParis_37,5.1) atha yasyāsamāpte karmaṇi barhir ādīpyeta tatas tan nirvāpya juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:2648: (AVParis_37,5.2) yad agnir barhir adahad vedyā vāso apāṃ tataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2649: tvam eva no jātavedo duritāt pāhi tasmāt ||
GV06avpari_u:2650: (AVParis_37,5.3) nirdagdhā no amitrās tu yathedaṃ barhis tathā |
GV06avpari_u:2651: amitrāṇāṃ śriyaṃ bhūtiṃ tām eṣāṃ pari nir jahi ||
GV06avpari_u:2652: (AVParis_37,5.4) yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu viśāmpate |
GV06avpari_u:2653: ye devā yajñam āyānti te no rakṣantu sarvataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2656: (AVParis_37,5.6) mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā mā bradhnaḥ śamyum icchata |
GV06avpari_u:2657: darbho rājā samudriyaḥ pari naḥ pātu viśvataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2658: (AVParis_37,5.7) ato 'nyad barhir upakalpyodakena saṃprokṣya punaḥ stṛṇāti ||
GV06avpari_u:2659: (AVParis_37,5.8) idaṃ barhir amṛteneha siktaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ haritaṃ te stṛṇāmi |
GV06avpari_u:2660: tad vai purāṇam abhinavaṃ stṛṇīṣva vāsaḥ praśastaṃ prati me gṛhāṇety anyena ca barhiṣābhiprachādaye
GV06avpari_u:2662: tam āhutiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya śaṃ no devīr ity ācamya brahmāparam ity ardharcenemāṃ hutvā brahmajyeṣṭheti hutvā sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2663: (AVParis_37,7.1) keśakīṭāvapannā cec chaṃbhuvāya svāheti bhasmani hutvā
GV06avpari_u:2664: havir utpūyānyāṃ juhuyāt sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2665: (AVParis_37,8.1) atha cec calitadantaṃ patitadantaṃ vopanayet tatra
GV06avpari_u:2666: prāyaścittam āha gṛhe vā barhiḥ [vā] pitā vācāryo vā dvādaśarātraṃ dīkṣeyātāṃ kartā trirātraṃ gaurasarṣapasarpiḥpayobhiḥ snātaḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ śuklavāsāḥ paurṇamāsaṃ tantram ājyabhāgānte sāvitrīm anuyojayet tena
GV06avpari_u:2668: (AVParis_37,8.2) sāvitrī śāntir brahma jajñānaṃ ye triṣaptā agniṃ brūma āyuṣyavarcasyasvastyayanābhayāparājitaśarmavarmabhir juhuyāt taṃ saṃpātya yaḥ śramāt tapaso yo vetasaṃ yo bhūtam ūrdhvā asyedāvatsarāya yady antarikṣe punar maitv indriyam ity āplāvayati sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2669: (AVParis_37,9.1) naśyec cen madughamaṇiḥ śāmyed vāgnir vivāhajaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2670: atyadbhutaṃ dvayam idaṃ dampatyos tu vināśanam ||
GV06avpari_u:2671: (AVParis_37,9.2) pūtudārumaṇis tatra bandhyo mantrāś ca mādughāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2672: pūtudāru na vindyāc ced yavaṃ tatra niyojayet ||
GV06avpari_u:2673: (AVParis_37,9.3) āyuṣmantau suprajasau suvīrau dhātā pūṣā draviṇe nau dadhātu |
GV06avpari_u:2674: vimuñcatāṃ śamalaṃ kilbiṣaṃ nau dīrgham āyuś ca savitā kṛṇotv iti śāntyudakenāṅguliṃ saṃprokṣya
GV06avpari_u:2676: juhuyād gāṃ ca kartre dadyāt sā atra prāyaścittḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2678: punas tvādityā ity agniṃ prāṇīya saṃnatibhir vyāhṛtibhiḥ samās tvāgne 'bhy
GV06avpari_u:2679: arcateti ca sūktābhyāṃ juhuyāt parisaṃkhyāhomāṃś ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2680: (AVParis_37,11.1) atha yatraitad vivāhagnir upaśāmyati agnipraṇayanamantraiḥ prājāpatyaṃ praṇīya prāktantraṃ praṇīya yad devā yad
GV06avpari_u:2681: vidvāṃso 'pamityam apratītaṃ yad dhastābhyaṃ yad adīvyann ity etaiḥ sūktair ājyaṃ juhuyāt samidho 'bhyādadhyād upatiṣṭheta vāsaḥ kartre dadyāt
GV06avpari_u:2682: (AVParis_37,12.1) atha yatraitat kālātītāsu kriyāsv atīta uttarāyaṇe
GV06avpari_u:2683: ājyabhāgānte yan me skannaṃ yad asmṛtīty anumantrayet tasmai prācyā diśo antardeśād iti paryāyān ekaviṃśatiṃ juhuyāt saṃskārātīte ca karmaṇi ||
GV06avpari_u:2684: (AVParis_37,13.1) atha yatraitat prāṇīto 'gnir upaśāmyati || yady antarikṣe punar maitv indriyaṃ punas tvādityā ity agniṃ praṇīya prajvālya mamāgne varca iti samidham ādhāya śeṣaṃ karma samāpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:2685: (AVParis_37,14.1) atha yasyopayāmo 'vapated dhastāt sa yan me upayāma ity
GV06avpari_u:2687: (AVParis_37,14.2) yan me upayāmo 'patad dhastād ya āyuṣā pariṣkṛtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2689: (AVParis_37,14.3) punar indraḥ punar bhagaḥ punar me brahmaṇaspatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2691: (AVParis_37,14.4) yan me chidraṃ yad asmṛtīti juhuyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:2692: (AVParis_37,15.1) yan me sruvo 'patad dhastād ity upayāmena vyākhyātam ||
GV06avpari_u:2693: (AVParis_37,16.1) mekhalādīni cet plaveran punar upanayeta || vimocanīyān homān hutvānyaṃ brāhmaṇam anūcānam upaveśyodapātraṃ cāparājitena niṣkramya vāso yajñopavītādi dattvābhyukṣyācamyāpāṃ sūktaiḥ pavitraiś ca saṃprokṣya priyaṃ mā kṛṇu deveṣv iti yajñopavītaṃ dattvā vimṛgvarīṃ mā naḥ paścād iti dvābhyāṃ prāṅmukha upaviśya mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitrī śāntisūktaṃ brahma jajñānaṃ yad asmṛty anumatiḥ sarvam iti juhuyād abhyātānaiś ca ||
GV06avpari_u:2694: (AVParis_37,17.1) atha yatraitan mekhalā prapatati jīrṇā vā syāt tāṃ sāvitryoddhṛtyāntaṃ kṛtvā śāntyudakena saṃprokṣya mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ sāvitrī
GV06avpari_u:2695: śāntisūktaṃ brahma jajñānaṃ ye triṣaptā idāvatsarāya ghṛtena tvāgniṃ brhūma iti ||
GV06avpari_u:2696: (AVParis_37,18.1) caturthyām ahutāyāṃ yadi ghaṭodakaṃ naśyeta tathaiva
GV06avpari_u:2697: punar ānīya śaṃ no devīr iheta devīr ity anumantryāmbayo yanty āpo hi ṣṭhā śaṃ no devīr iti saṃpātya vyāhṛtyā saṃnatyā ca juhuyāt āpo bhṛgvaṅgirorūpam apāṃ puṣpam ity udakumbham abhimantrayet || vāso dakṣiṇā ||
GV06avpari_u:2698: (AVParis_37,19.1) atha yasyāsamāpte karmaṇy udapātraṃ pravarteta tad
GV06avpari_u:2701: sthānāc cyutaṃ pravartitaṃ tan me vahatu kilbiṣam || ity āsthāpayati ||
GV06avpari_u:2702: (AVParis_37,19.3) pūraṇena pūrayitvā punaḥ pūrṇam ity etayā |
GV06avpari_u:2706: (AVParis_37,19.5) ūrjaṃ puṣṭaṃ dadhātu no rāyas poṣaṃ śriyam āyuḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2708: (AVParis_37,20.1) atha cet prabhajyeta bhūmir bhūmim agād ity anumantryānyataram āhṛtya yady antarikṣe punar maitv indriyam ity
GV06avpari_u:2709: anumantrya vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ud enaṃ vaiśvānaro raśmibhir iti juhuyāt sā tatra prāyaścittiḥ
GV06avpari_u:2711: (AVParis_38,1.1) oṃ brahmakūrcavidhiṃ puṇyaṃ saṃkṣepād vacmy asaṃśayam |
GV06avpari_u:2712: pāvanānāṃ paraṃ yo hi pāvanaṃ tapasāṃ tapaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2717: (AVParis_38,1.4) gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam |
GV06avpari_u:2718: āharet tāmrapātre tu śakṛn mūtraṃ tv abhūgatam ||
GV06avpari_u:2720: payas tu tāmravarṇāyāḥ śvetāya āhared dadhi ||
GV06avpari_u:2721: (AVParis_38,1.6) kapilāyā ghṛtaṃ grāhyam alābhe syāt tu pañcamam ||
GV06avpari_u:2723: kṣīrasya sapta dadhnas tu trīṇy ekaikaṃ ghṛtāmbhasoḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2725: ā pyāyasveti ca kṣīraṃ dadhikrāvṇeti vai dadhi ||
GV06avpari_u:2726: (AVParis_38,2.3) tejo 'si śukram ity ajyaṃ devasya tvā kuśodakam |
GV06avpari_u:2727: saptapattrās tu ye darbhā achinnāgrāḥ samāyutāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2729: agnaye svāhā somāya prajāpataya ity api ||
GV06avpari_u:2730: (AVParis_38,2.5) bṛhaspate ati yad idaṃ viṣṇur itīti ca |
GV06avpari_u:2731: mānastokena gāyatryā etaiś ca juhuyāt tataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2732: (AVParis_38,2.6) praṇavena praṇavenaiva pibec ca praṇavena tu |

GV06avpari_u:2736: (AVParis_38,3.2) yat tvagasthigataṃ pāpaṃ dehe tiṣṭhati dehinām |
GV06avpari_u:2742: (AVParis_38,3.5) bālatve yat kṛtaṃ caiva yuvā vṛddhavayās tathā |
GV06avpari_u:2743: mātāpitṛkṛtaṃ caiva tat kṣaṇād eva nirdahet ||
GV06avpari_u:2749: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ hy etat pavitraṃ paramaṃ hitam ||
GV06avpari_u:2751: (AVParis_39,1.1) oṃ pippalādaṃ mahāprājñam idam ūcur maharṣayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:2755: (AVParis_39,1.3) śāntyudakena tad brahmā pūrvoktaṃ yad agastinā |
GV06avpari_u:2756: pari prāgād iti dvābhyām abhimantrayate tataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2757: (AVParis_39,1.4) carutantreṇa vidhinā caruṃ bhaumaṃ tu nirvapet |
GV06avpari_u:2758: prāktantram ājyabhāgāntaṃ satyaṃ bṛhad iti smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:2759: (AVParis_39,1.5) havir ājyaṃ samidhaś ca upasthānaṃ yathākramam |
GV06avpari_u:2760: kūpādīnāṃ samīpe tu japen mantrān samāhitaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:2761: (AVParis_39,1.6) ambayo yanty āpo hi ṣṭhā śaṃ no devīr iti trayam |
GV06avpari_u:2762: hiraṇyavarṇāḥ punantu mā sasruṣīr himavato 'psu te ||
GV06avpari_u:2763: (AVParis_39,1.7) japtvā tu dhenum ānītāṃ pibantīm anumantrayet |
GV06avpari_u:2764: ā gāva iti sūktena tārayet tu tathaiva gām ||
GV06avpari_u:2766: upa hvaye sūyavasāt kartre dadyāt tu gāṃ śubhām ||
GV06avpari_u:2771: (AVParis_39,1.11) śāntyudakaṃ pañcagavyaṃ tasminn eva jale kṣipet |
GV06avpari_u:2773: (AVParis_39,1.12) brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tu puṇyāhaṃ vācayet tataḥ |

GV06avpari_u:5253: muṇḍakā praśnakā brahmavidyā kṣurikā cūlikā atharvaśiro atharvaśikhā garbhopaniṣan mahopaniṣad brahmopaniṣat prāṇāgnihotraṃ māṇḍukyaṃ nādabindu brahmabindu amṛtabindu dhyānabindu tejobindu yogaśikhā yogatattvaṃ nīlarudraḥ pañcatāpinī ekadaṇḍī saṃnyāsavidhiḥ aruṇiḥ haṃsaḥ paramahaṃsaḥ nārāyaṇopaniṣad vaitathyaṃ ceti ||
GV06avpari_u:5254: (AVParis_49,4.5) tatra gopathaḥ śataprapāṭhakaṃ brāhmaṇam āsīt tasyāvaśiṣṭe dve brāhmaṇe pūrvam uttaraṃ ceti ||
GV06avpari_u:5255: (AVParis_49,4.6) tatra ṣaḍ aṅgāny adhītya ṣaḍaṅgavid bhavati ṣaḍ aṅgāni bhavanti, śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chando jyotiṣam iti ||
GV06avpari_u:5258: caturtha āṅgirasaḥ kalpaḥ śāntikalpas tu pañcamaḥ

GV06avpari_u:5379: (AVParis_49,5.1) yo vai brahmavedeṣūpanītaḥ sa sarvavedeṣūpanito (AVParis_49,5.2) yo vai brahmavedeṣv anupanītaḥ sa sarvavedeṣv anupanītaḥ
GV06avpari_u:5380: (AVParis_49,5.3) anyavede dvijo yo brahmavedam adhītukāmaḥ sa punar upaneyo (AVParis_49,5.4) devāś ca ṛṣayaś ca brahmāṇam ūcuḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5390: (AVParis_49,5.9) iti tasyārhaṃ brahmavedaś caturṇāṃ vedānāṃ sāṅgopāṅgānām
GV06avpari_u:5392: (AVParis_49,5.10) athāto brahmavedaḥ kapilo varṇena tīkṣṇaḥ pracaṇḍaḥ
GV06avpari_u:5395: (AVParis_49,5.11) kṣudrakarmā sa ca bhagavān brahmavedaś caturmukho
GV06avpari_u:5396: dvipakṣo dānto dharmī balavān prājñaḥ kṛtotthāpanīyaḥ krūraḥ ṣaḍrātrāṇi vimṛśī [ṣaḍrātrāṇi ṣaḍ] vaitāyano gotreṇa (AVParis_49,5.12) ya ekaikasmin vedānāṃ nāmavarṇagotrarūpapramāṇaṃ ca kīrtayed yo vidvān jātismaro bhavati mṛtaḥ sa brahmalokaṃ gacchati ||
GV06avpari_u:5398: (AVParis_50,1.1) oṃ vṛttaṃ prātar amāvāsyāṃ paścād dṛśyeta candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5399: tasya varṇaṃ gatiṃ rūpaṃ sthānaṃ caivoccanīcatām ||
GV06avpari_u:5400: (AVParis_50,1.2) hrāsavṛddhiṃ ca śṛṅgāṇāṃ nakṣatraṃ yac ca yojayet |
GV06avpari_u:5402: (AVParis_50,1.3) prathame darśane tv indoḥ samāsādya yadā graham |
GV06avpari_u:5404: (AVParis_50,1.4) evam eva śraviṣṭhābhyas teṣām ante ca candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5407: vidarbhān madrakāṃś caiva bharatāṃś cāpi sarvataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5408: (AVParis_50,2.1) sārāṇāṃ vijarāṇāṃ ca samudre ye ca dakṣiṇe |
GV06avpari_u:5409: etāñ janapadān hanti yadā syād uttaronnataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5411: śālvānāṃ ca virājānāṃ samudre ye ca paścime ||
GV06avpari_u:5412: (AVParis_50,2.3) etāj janapadān hanti yadā syād dakṣinonnataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5415: godhāṃś ca bhadrakāṃś caiva madhyaṃ ca kurubhiḥ saha ||
GV06avpari_u:5417: kṣudrakān mālavān matsyān mlecchān saha pulindakaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5418: (AVParis_50,2.6) śastropajījikuḍyāṃś ca brāhmaṇā yodhinaś ca ye |
GV06avpari_u:5420: (AVParis_50,3.1) lakṣaṇād vā bhavet sthūlaḥ kāye śṛṅge ca hīyate |
GV06avpari_u:5421: alpe śarīre durbhikṣaṃ bhayaṃ rogaṃ vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:5422: (AVParis_50,3.2) yadā pratipadaś candraḥ prakṛtyā vikṛto bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:5424: (AVParis_50,3.3) ṣaṣṭhyāṃ madhyaṃ yadā gacched rājā vadhyeta pārthivaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5425: avantīnāṃ ca pūrvārdhaṃ māgadhāś ca viśeṣataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5426: (AVParis_50,3.4) paraṃ kumāreṣv aṣṭamyāṃ rājānaṃ daśamī param |
GV06avpari_u:5427: evaṃ ca pakṣāpacaye madhye dṛśyeta dvādaśī ||
GV06avpari_u:5429: sarvāṃś ca kuryād rājñas tu tasminn utpātadarśane ||
GV06avpari_u:5432: (AVParis_50,4.2) kṛttikānāṃ maghānāṃ ca rohiṇyāś ca viśākhayoḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5433: eteṣām uttaro mārgo rājavīthīti tāṃ viduḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5435: nāvarṣā uttamā jñeyā yogakṣemaṃ tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:5437: govīthīti tadāpy āhur gargasya vacanaṃ yathā ||
GV06avpari_u:5438: (AVParis_50,4.5) aṣṭau sthānāni candrasya kroṣṭukir yāni veda vai |
GV06avpari_u:5440: (AVParis_50,4.6) daṇḍasthāyī caturthas tu daṇḍaśāyī tu pañcamaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5441: ṣaṣthas tu yūpasthāyī syāt pārśvaśāyī tu saptamaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5445: mārīṃ samadhikām āhur yadā syād uttaronnataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5446: (AVParis_50,5.2) daṇḍasthāyī tv amātyānāṃ bhayaṃ rogaṃ vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:5448: (AVParis_50,5.3) ete deśān vilumpanti daṇḍasthāyī yadā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:5449: daṇḍaśāyī tu viprāṇāṃ bhayaṃ tatra vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:5450: (AVParis_50,5.4) yūpasthāyī tu dhānyānāṃ bhayaṃ tatra vinirdiśet |
GV06avpari_u:5451: harite śarīre somasya paśūnāṃ vadham ādiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:5452: (AVParis_50,5.5) kṛṣṇe śarīre somasya śūdrāṇāṃ vadham ādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:5453: pīte śarīre somasya vaiśyānāṃ vadham ādiśet
GV06avpari_u:5454: (AVParis_50,5.6) rakte śarīre somasya rājñāṃ tu vadham ādiśet |
GV06avpari_u:5456: (AVParis_50,6.1) snigdhaḥ pītaḥ suvarṇābhaḥ pakṣādau yadi candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5458: (AVParis_50,6.2) uccasthāne yadā pītaḥ samaśṛṅgaḥ śaśī bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:5462: (AVParis_50,6.4) rājavīthīṃ tu saṃprāpta ugradaṇḍī yadā bhavet |
GV06avpari_u:5466: (AVParis_50,7.1) saṃgrāmaṃ yojayet somo loke tu tumulaṃ bhayam |
GV06avpari_u:5467: dvicandraṃ gaganaṃ dṛṣṭvā brūyād brahmavadho mahān ||
GV06avpari_u:5468: (AVParis_50,7.2) dvau sūryau vā yadā syātāṃ tadā kṣatravadho mahān |
GV06avpari_u:5469: dṛṣṭvā tu caturaḥ sūryān uditān sarvatodiśam ||
GV06avpari_u:5471: āditye pāṇḍuraṃ chattraṃ saṃdhyāvelāṃ yadā bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:5473: ādityasya rathaḥ śvetaḥ saṃdhyāvelāṃ yadā bhavet ||
GV06avpari_u:5475: (AVParis_50,8.1) ādityaḥ sarvataś chinno dvaidhībhutaḥ pradṛśyate. deśasya vidravaṃ sūryo rājamṛtyuṃ vinirdiśet ||
GV06avpari_u:5478: (AVParis_50,9.2) divā hy asmin pataty ulkā satataṃ kampate mahī |
GV06avpari_u:5481: śṛṅgaṃ bhavaty ādityasya tṛṇakāṣṭhaṃ ca śuṣyati ||
GV06avpari_u:5482: (AVParis_50,9.4) rājāno hy aśivās tatra citraṃ varṣati mādhavaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5483: dvādaśānāṃ tu māsānāṃ madhye naśyati pārthivaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5486: (AVParis_50,9.6) saptāhaṃ tu bhaved goṣu saptāhaṃ mṛgapakṣiṣu |
GV06avpari_u:5487: mānuṣeṣu ca saptāhaṃ tataḥ śreyas tu kalpayet ||
GV06avpari_u:5489: (AVParis_51,1.1) oṃ ke cid grahā nārarān āśrayante ke cid grahā [jyotiṣi]
GV06avpari_u:5491: graho graheṇaiva hataḥ kathaṃ syād vijñāya tattvaṃ bhagavān bravītu ||
GV06avpari_u:5492: (AVParis_51,1.2) evaṃ sa pṛṣṭo munibhir mahātmā provāca gargo grahayuddhatantram |
GV06avpari_u:5493: parājayaṃ caiva jayaṃ ca teṣāṃ śubhāsubham(aśubhamñ)
GV06avpari_u:5495: (AVParis_51,1.3) arko jātaḥ kaliṅgeṣu yavaneṣu ca candramāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5496: aṅgārakas tv avantyāyāṃ magadhāyāṃ budhas tathā ||
GV06avpari_u:5499: ketur malayake jāta ity etad grahajātakam ||
GV06avpari_u:5500: (AVParis_51,1.5) yasmin deśe tu yo jātaḥ sa grahaḥ pīḍyate yadā taṃ deśaṃ ghātitaṃ vidyād durbhikṣeṇa bhayena vā ||
GV06avpari_u:5501: (AVParis_51,2.1) divākaraś caiva śanaiścaras tathā bṛhaspatiś caiva budhaś ca nāgarāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5502: prajāpatiḥ ketur athāpi candramās tathaiva rāhūśanasau ca yāyinaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5503: (AVParis_51,2.2) yadā graho nagara eva nāgaraṃ vijeṣyate yāyy atha vāpi
GV06avpari_u:5505: tadā nṛpo nāgara eva nāgaraṃ vijeṣyate vāyy atha vāpi yāyinam ||
GV06avpari_u:5506: (AVParis_51,2.3) ārohaṇaṃ ca bhedaś ca lekhanaṃ savyadakṣiṇam |
GV06avpari_u:5511: (AVParis_51,2.5) sarveṣāṃ nabhasi samāgame grahāṇām uktṛṣṭo bhavati
GV06avpari_u:5513: snigdhatvaṃ bhavati tu yasya [sa graho graheṇa]
GV06avpari_u:5515: (AVParis_51,3.1) śyāmo vā vyapagataraśmimaṇḍalo vā rūkṣo vā
GV06avpari_u:5517: ākrānto vinipatitas tato 'pasavyo vijñeyo hata iti sa graho graheṇa ||
GV06avpari_u:5518: (AVParis_51,3.2) budhaś ca bhaumaḥ śanibhārgavāṅgirāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ yāti
GV06avpari_u:5520: anamayatvaṃ triṣu saukhyam uttamaṃ viparyaye cāpi mahāñ janakṣayaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5521: (AVParis_51,3.3) dhanakanakarajatasaṃcayāś ca sarve śamadamamantraparāś caye manuṣyāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5522: śakayavanatukhārabālhikāś ca kṣayam upayānti divākarasya ghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:5523: (AVParis_51,3.4) atha some hate vidyād dhrvaṃ rājño viparyayaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5527: (AVParis_51,4.1) traigartāḥ kṣitipatayaḥ sayodhamukhyāḥ pīḍyante girinilayāgnijīvinaś ca |
GV06avpari_u:5528: saṃgrāmāḥ sarudhirapāṃsuvarṣamiśrā durbhikṣaṃ bhavati dharāsutasya ghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:5529: (AVParis_51,4.2) sāgaranilayāḥ paurāḥ kṣayam upayānti narā vaṇikpradhānāḥ
GV06avpari_u:5530: | bhavati tu [rājā] vijayī prayāyī budhabandhane prapatanti cātra sobhyāḥ
GV06avpari_u:5531: (AVParis_51,4.3) daivajñās tapasi ciraṃ suniścitārthāḥ syur dāntā
GV06avpari_u:5533: āgantur jayati vadhaś ca nāgarāṇāṃ trailokyam
GV06avpari_u:5535: (AVParis_51,4.4) yo rājā prathitaparākramaḥ pṛthivyāṃ vaṅgāṅgādiṣu madadhāḥ saśūrasenāḥ
GV06avpari_u:5536: ye yodhāḥ samaraṇabhumilabdhaśabdās te sainyaiḥ kṣayam upayānti śukraghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:5537: (AVParis_51,4.5) mahiṣakavṛṣabhāḥ sabhasmapauṇḍrāḥ kṛṣipaśupālyaratāś ca ye manuṣyāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5538: vividhabhayasamāhitās tu sarve kṣayam upayānti śanaiścarasya ghāte ||
GV06avpari_u:5539: (AVParis_51,5.1) ye ke cin nṛpatiṣu dāmbhikāḥ piśācāḥ kāryāṇāṃ vrataniyameṣu channapāpāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5540: ye cānye śabarapulindacedigādhā bādhyante yadi bhavate 'tra rāhughātaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5541: (AVParis_51,5.2) ākrāntaṃ samanubhavanti yāyisaṃghā vadhyante yadi bhavate
GV06avpari_u:5543: saṃgrāmāḥ sarudhirapāṃsuvarṣamiśra durbhikṣaṃ bhavati tu ketupīḍanena ||
GV06avpari_u:5544: (AVParis_51,5.3) yat kiṃ cid divigatam antarikṣajaṃ vā bhaumaṃ vā bhavati
GV06avpari_u:5546: tat savaṃ stanitamahābhrabidyudvarṣaiḥ śāntaṃ syād bhavati sadakṣiṇaiś ca homaiḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5547: (AVParis_51,5.4) ye deśā grahagaṇabhinnabhūmikampā yeṣāṃ vā graha
GV06avpari_u:5550: (AVParis_51,5.5) prasavyas triṣu māseṣu saṃsargo māsikaḥ smṛtaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5551: lekhane pakṣa ity āhur bhedane saptarātrikam ||
GV06avpari_u:5552: (AVParis_51,5.6) āgneyā vāsavāś caiva vāyavyā vāruṇās tathā |
GV06avpari_u:5553: sarva eva śubhā jñeyā gargasya vacanaṃ yathā ||
GV06avpari_u:5555: (AVParis_52,1.1) om atharvāṇaṃ namaskṛtya uvāca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5556: kīdṛśā grahaputrāś ca kiyanto vā vadasva me ||
GV06avpari_u:5557: (AVParis_52,1.2) pṛṣṭaha sa śaunakenātha brāhmaṇānāṃ hitāya vai |
GV06avpari_u:5561: (AVParis_52,1.4) pṛthikcarāś ca ye tatra te ca syuḥ saṃghacāriṇaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5569: (AVParis_52,2.3) śuklā nikarāḥ saurābhās tyajanta iva cārciṣaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5570: sphuranta iva cākāśe bimbakā raśmibhir vṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5573: (AVParis_52,2.5) ye śvetāḥ kiṃcid ākṛṣṇā viśikhāḥ syur vitārakāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5574: te ṣaṣṭiḥ kanakā nāma śanaiścarasutā grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5578: triśikhā vā tribhāgā vā ṣaṣṭir ity uttare pathi ||
GV06avpari_u:5580: śatam ekādhikaṃ mṛtyoḥ putrāḥ syur dhūmaketavaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5582: rāhoḥ putrās trayas triṃśad grahās tāmasakīlakāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5584: viśvarūpāḥ sutā agner grahā viṃśaṃ śataṃ smṛtam ||
GV06avpari_u:5585: (AVParis_52,4.1) aruṇās tu sutā vāyor dāruṇāḥ saptasaptatiḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5588: prājāpatyā grahās tv aṣṭau gaṇakā nāmanāmataḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5594: ete nāmnā smṛtāḥ kaṅkās triṃśad dvau vāruṇā grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5596: kālaputrāḥ kabandhās te smṛtāḥ ṣaṇṇavatir grahāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5597: (AVParis_52,5.2) arciṣmāṃś ca prabhāsaś ca romaśo viṣamāṃs tathā |
GV06avpari_u:5599: (AVParis_52,5.3) ṛṣakaiś caiva rādhātaḥ kumudaḥ phanako ghanaḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5600: eṣām aśveti vijñeyā ārās tu parisarpakāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5603: (AVParis_52,5.5) atisaṃtānakāś tv anye ṣaṣṭir vāyoḥ sutā grahāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5605: (AVParis_52,6.1) miśrībhūtās tu te jñeyā guṇṭhitā iva reṇunā |
GV06avpari_u:5606: dhūmaketoḥ sutā jñeyāḥ śatam ekādhikaṃ ca tat ||
GV06avpari_u:5609: (AVParis_52,6.3) ye tu nakṣatravaṃśasya bhāgam uttaram āśritāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5611: (AVParis_52,6.4) vyālakasya tu ye putrāḥ saptaṣaṣṭiḥ samantataḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5615: ekatārā dvitārā vā atha vā pañcatārakaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5616: (AVParis_52,7.1) brahmarāśes tu te putrā grahāḥ saṃtānasaṃsthitāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5619: pañcaṣaṣṭis tu te jñeyāḥ prājāpatyā grahāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5621: dṛśyante kārmukā nāma saptatyekā samāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5627: daṇḍāś ca rāhuputrāḥ syur nāmabhis tulyavarcasaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5632: (AVParis_52,8.4) pannagās tu caturviṃśat kṛṣṇā dvātriṃśatir grahāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5637: uttarāparatas tv ekaḥ pītarakto grahaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5639: yaḥ saṃdhivelāsv arkābho dikṣu sarvāsu dṛśyate ||
GV06avpari_u:5640: (AVParis_52,9.3) nātidūre raveḥ snigdhaḥ sa varṣāyābhayāya ca |
GV06avpari_u:5643: saptaite sthāvarā jñeyāḥ saha sūryeṇa sarpiṇaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5647: dṛḍhavratas triśaṅkuś ca ajau vaiśvānare mṛḍaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5648: (AVParis_52,10.2) aruṇaś ca danuś caiva yāmyāyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ |
GV06avpari_u:5649: gautamo 'trir vasiṣṭhaś ca viśvāmitras tu kaśyapaḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5650: (AVParis_52,10.3) ṛcīkaputraś ca tathā bharadvājaś ca vīryavān |
GV06avpari_u:5651: ete sapta mahātmāna udīcyāṃ sthāvarāḥ smṛtāḥ ||
GV06avpari_u:5653: pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ somo bhṛgur aṅgirasā saha ||
GV06avpari_u:5654: (AVParis_52,10.5) hāhāhūhū ca vijñeyau viṣṇoś ca padam uttamam |
GV06avpari_u:5660: (AVParis_52,11.3) hrasvāny asnehayuktāni na bhāvāya bhavanti hi |
GV06avpari_u:5661: yat kiṃcit sthāvaraṃ loke tat prasanneṣu vardhate ||
GV06avpari_u:5663: ādityaś caiva śukraś ca lohitāṅgas tathaiva ca ||
GV06avpari_u:5665: aindra āgneyo yāmyaś ca nairṛto vāruṇas tathā ||

GV06avpari_u:8034: (AVParis_72,5.3) sṛjanti devā divyādbhutāni prāg upasargāt pratibodhanārtham |
GV06avpari_u:8035: kāryāṇi vighnāni tathā janānāṃ karmākule varṇasamākule ca ||
GV06avpari_u:8036: (AVParis_72,5.4) daivyopasṛṣṭena balena kāryaṃ kārya ca śāntiḥ praṇipatya devān |
GV06avpari_u:8037: tatopasargād vighnāt pramucyate divi ced aniṣṭaṃ na punaḥ sa kuryāt ||
GV06avpari_u:8038: (AVParis_72,5.5) pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca divi cāpy upalakṣayet |
GV06avpari_u:8040: (AVParis_72,6.1) grāme kule vā yadi vāpi deśe rājany amātyeṣu tathā
GV06avpari_u:8042: bhāvaḥ paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt
GV06avpari_u:8044: apādahaste mriyate hy amātyo jāte kavandhe nṛpatir vinaśyet ||
GV06avpari_u:8045: (AVParis_72,6.3) yadādhikāṅgo yadi vāṅgahīno bhavet paśūnāṃ vikṛto virūpaḥ
GV06avpari_u:8046: | strīṇāṃ tathaiva vikṛto virūpas tad adbhutaṃ tasya deśasya vidyāt ||
GV06avpari_u:8047: (AVParis_72,6.4) anāsyaṃ vāpy anoṣṭhaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam |
GV06avpari_u:8048: arūpam asarūpaṃ vā jāyate ced vidūlakam ||
GV06avpari_u:8049: (AVParis_72,6.5) adharādīnn acakṣur vā jāyate ced vidūlakam |
GV06avpari_u:8051: (AVParis_72,6.6) tam adbhiḥ snātaṃ surabhiṃ sugandhiṃ gatāsum agnau juhuyād ghṛtāktam |
GV06avpari_u:8052: ganeṇa raudreṇa ghṛtaṃ ca hutvā tathā mahātmā śivam asya kuryāt ||
